problem.markdown:
>>What is the difference between open and closed networks? <<
[x] Whether items can enter and leave the system. [x] Whether L is known. [ ] Whether W is known. [x] Whether materials in the system are constant.
[explanation] In open networks, customers can enter and leave whereas in a closed network the population in the system is constant. In open networks \(\lambda\) is known and L is unknown whereas in closed networks L is known and \(\lambda\) is unknown. In both open and closed systems, W is unknown. [explanation]
